vomm
Class VMM

java.lang.Object
  vomm.VMM
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class VMM
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The VMM class implements Variable Order Markov Models

learn

public void learn(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sequence)
Generates VOMM from a sequence by counting seed symbol pairs in sequence for each order and storing them in a nested list for every order as a replacement of a 2D array so we can add symbols to the alphabet and new contexts

Parameters:
sequence - ArrayList sequence to learn the probabilities from

Parameters:

Returns:

sample_fuzzy

public com.cycling74.max.Atom[] sample_fuzzy(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> seed,
                                             int distance,
                                             double typicality,
                                             int max_order)
Sampling Symbol from the mean probability distribution described by similar contexts to input(Similarity-Measure = Hamming-Distance) We search for contexts that only differ by as many characters as defined by the distance and take the mean distribution out of all similar contexts We have the same smoothing method as before, that at a 0 probability distribution we go down an order

Parameters:
seed - String context to get the similar contexts of *
distance - Sets the amount of Hamming-distance
typicality - value between 1-0 to decide the typicality of the probabilities
Returns:
Sampled symbol

sample

public com.cycling74.max.Atom[] sample(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> seed,
                                       double typicality,
                                       int max_order)
Returns one character sampling from probabilities of Symbols appearing after context, getting the probabilities of all possible symbols appearing after the seed. If the seed isn't found in the Markov-model of order N we go down an order, this is our smoothing method to surcumvent

Parameters:
seed - Seed used to sample next symbol
typicality - value between 1-0 to decide the typicality of the probabilities
max_order - int Maximal order of VOMM that should be used
Returns:
Sampled Symbol and its probability

sampleStart

public com.cycling74.max.Atom[] sampleStart(double typicality)
Samples Symbol from probabilities of Symbols appearing after empty sequence

Parameters:
typicality - value between 1-0 to decide the typicality of the probabilities
Returns:
Symbol sampled from the probability distribution following an empty seed and its probability
